Fwd: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054
From [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
To [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Sonya Thompson
Date 2019/08/13 12:47
Subject: Fwd: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Epstein [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 6318-054_SRO_20190710-20190 723.pdf, Epstein [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 6318-054_SRO_20190729-20190 810.pdf
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
See attached reconstructed SROs.
>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] /13/2019 11:36 AM >>>
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
I attached 2 copies of Epstein SRO reviews:
1. Epstein [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 76318-054_SRO_20190710-20190723.pdf (confined in SHU 7/10/2019 - 7/23/2019), and
2. Epstein [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 76318-054_SRO_20190729-20190810.pdf (confined in SHU 7/29/2019 - 8/10/2019)
Because the first confinement, Epstein was held only 2 days in SHU (7/7/2019 - 7/8/2019), NYM did not review Epstein.
Thanks,
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> 8/12/2019 12:40 PM >>>
Please do it. We need it tomorrow morning at the latest.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 12:38 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054
>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 08/12/2019 12:38 >>>
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
SRO review data is stored in DREV table. But SHU generates SRO review for inmates are currently in Z house. I need to write some code to get around to get the SRO reports for Epstein.
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

I attached 2 copies of Epstein SRO reviews:
1. Epstein [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 76318-054_SRO_20190710-20190723.pdf (confined in SHU 7/10/2019 - 7/23/2019), and
2. Epstein [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 76318-054_SRO_20190729-20190810.pdf (confined in SHU 7/29/2019 - 8/10/2019)
Because the first confinement, Epstein was held only 2 days in SHU (7/7/2019 - 7/8/2019), NYM did not review Epstein.

From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 12:38 PM (GMT-05:00)

SRO review data is stored in DREV table. But SHU generates SRO review for inmates are currently in Z house. I need to write some code to get around to get the SRO reports for Epstein.

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the reconstruction of data for Inmate Epstein. The email contains redactions of personal information and email addresses.
